duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide impeccable C-I-CARE in all patient interactions and ensure a positive in-office experience through patient intake, schedule management, billing, and insurance.
Manage front of house duties including check-in, check-out, insurance verification, and paperwork tasks.
Contribute to team development through rounding, attending team huddles, and participating in team problem solving.
Master technology suite including Slack, G-suite, Zoom, and Electronic Medical Record System 1Life.
Perform opening and closing duties/daily office upkeep, maintaining the look and feel of patient and employee facing spaces, restocking supplies, and organization.

education_certification.credential: At least 1 year of experience in high touch customer service or patient-facing roles
